weekly_top_story.headline: US Envoy to Meet Putin in Moscow to Finalize Ukraine Peace Plan as Zelensky Welcomes Principles
weekly_top_story.summary: US President Donald Trump's envoy Steve Witkoff is set to meet Russian President Vladimir Putin in Moscow to resolve outstanding issues in a US-proposed peace plan for Ukraine, which Ukrainian President Zelensky has cautiously welcomed as a basis for deeper agreements, amid continuing conflict and European skepticism.

stories.headline: Trump Says ‘Very Close’ to Ukraine Peace Deal, But Europe Remains Cautious
stories.summary: President Trump announced the Ukraine peace deal is nearing completion, while European leaders maintain skepticism as Russian missile attacks on Kyiv continue.

stories.headline: All 24 Abducted Nigerian Schoolgirls Rescued, President Confirms
stories.summary: Nigeria's president confirmed the successful rescue of 24 schoolgirls abducted last week in Kebbi, marking a significant achievement in national security efforts against armed assailants.

stories.headline: Two Climbers Dead and Two Rescued on New Zealand’s Highest Peak
stories.summary: Tragedy struck New Zealand’s Aoraki peak as two climbers died and two others were rescued from dangerous conditions, highlighting ongoing risks in high-altitude mountaineering.
